mapper.insert:
insert into wa_train_organization.import_employee(real_name, phone, sex, remark, create_by, create_time, event_id, email, id_number) values
(#{entity.realName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.eventId}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.idNumber})

insert into wa_train_organization.import_employee(real_name, phone, sex, remark, create_by, create_time, event_id, email, id_number) values
(#{entity.realName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.eventId}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.idNumber})
on duplicate key update real_name = values(real_name) , phone = values(phone) , sex = values(sex) , remark = values(remark) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , event_id = values(event_id) , email = values(email) , id_number = values(id_number) $empty
